Since I am unable to reproduce the problem (see my previous comment, where is very used your model definition and was able to create a working training loop), it's hard to provide advice. Thanks.

body:
Can you provide a minimal self contained example that reproduces the problem? The code snippets provided so far seem to refer to code not already included (eg `to_categorical`). 

Since I am unable to reproduce the problem (see my previous comment, where is very used your model definition and was able to create a working training loop), it's hard to provide advice. Thanks.
